title: Amber Rose welcomes a baby boy to the world with boyfriend Alexander 'A.E.' Edwards
text:
Amber Rose has given birth to a baby boy.

The model, 35, who already has son Sebastian, SIX, with ex-husband Wiz Khalifa - and her partner Alexander 'A.E.' Edwards delightedly welcomed the tot on Thursday.

A.E. shared a photo of himself cradling his baby son on Instagram and paid tribute to his partner, while revealing the unique name Slash Electric Alexander.

Spot on! Amber Rose has given birth to a baby boy

Clearly enamoured with his new arrival, A.E. captioned the picture: "Slash Electric Alexander Edwards.. the world is urs no', alongside a heart Emoji.

He went on: 'Thank u @amberrose for loving me so much that u put ur body thru it 2 bring my sun in2 the world. I could never be as strong as u. Slash a rockstar'.

Amber shared a series of videos from the delivery room on her Instagram story, featuring the rapper wearing scrubs alongside the caption "It's time".

Passing the time during her undoubtedly trying labour, she also shared a number of clips of him playing rock, paper, scissors with Sebastian.

Adoring boyfriend: The 35-year-old model - who already has six-year-old son Sebastian with ex-husband Wiz Khalifa - and her partner Alexander 'A.E.' Edwards welcomed Slash Electric Alexander into the world on Thursday (10.10.19)

Amber announced her pregnancy on social media in April by posting a picture of herself whilst having a scan.

She added a caption reading: '@ae4president and I are SUPER excited to announce that we have a Sweet little Baby Boy on the way! P.S Sebastian is soooooo Happy to be a big brother! (sic)'

Whilst Alexander added in his own post: 'Even when it's dark.. my SON will shine. Thank u baby 4 my greatest gift...I love you ...

'I can't wait to thug it out w my baby boy. & baby boy, I promise I won't get mad if ur first words r "where the b*****s @?" ( jokinggg-no hyper-masculinity) (sic)"

The Slutwalk founder suffered with Hyperemesis, extreme morning sickness, in both her pregnancies and admitted to her struggles.
description: The 35-year-old model - who already has six-year-old son Sebastian with ex-husband Wiz Khalifa - and her partner Alexander 'A.E.' Edwards welcomed Slash Electric Alexander into the world on Thursday
